profile.description:
My name is Williams, I'm a Full Stack Javascript developer.

I'm passionate about new technologies. For more than 15 years I've been dedicated to the training of educators and students. I love challenges, I've assumed leadership positions, teamwork, problem solving.

Teaching profession, with a specialization in Computer Technologies in Education. I've coordinated teams of more than 64 people, trained more than 3000 students, today education teachers. Developed online courses and training with Moodle. I have become a programmer, because I like to find solutions and automate processes.

For more than 4 years I have worked in sales, inventory management, customer service. I have implemented and managed a wordpress/woocommerce e-commerce store with more than 20,000 products. Currently I am developing personal projects in Node, React, Express and Postgres.
